Philosophy The Microdelivery Triple-Acid Brightening Peel

Brand: philosophy

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: AQUA/WATER/EAU, ALCOHOL DENAT., GLYCERETH-7 TRIACETATE, MANDELIC ACID, NIACINAMIDE, GLYCOLIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, MALIC ACID, PEG-8/SMDI COPOLYMER, ARGININE, PPG-26-BUTETH-26, GLYCERIN, BISABOLOL, PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL, HIBISCUS SABDARIFFA FLOWER EXTRACT, ADENOSINE, SARGASSUM MUTICUM EXTRACT, MAGNESIUM HYDROXIDE
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
